entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Dome Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
